comments.author: PancherSh
comments.body: Staking is a very important component of the correct distribution of your funds, which should work for themselves, and not just lie quietly in your wallet.  Stablecoin staking is in high demand today, and in particular in bittix, where the user receives 4.5 percent monthly.
